# Wavesurfer Audio Player

<p>This is an extremely lightweight and efficient standalone audio player web component that will work anywhere on the web. 
It automatically analyzes the audio's waveform and draws it in the player. 
It also provides some simple current play time and full time duration of the audio file.</p> 
<p>
This player is completely responsive.
</p>

# Attributes
<table>
<thead>
<tr><td>Attribute</td><td>Description</td></tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
    <tr>
        <td><strong>audio</strong></td>
        <td>the relative file location of the audio file you are loading including file name and extension</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
        <td><strong>title</strong></td>
        <td>title of the song/clip</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
        <td><strong>color</strong></td>
        <td>the desired color of the waveform</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
        <td><strong>height</strong></td>
        <td>the desired height of the waveform</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
        <td><strong>theme</strong></td>
        <td>Currently only "basic" and "dark" are supported. If attribute is not provided, it will default to basic</td>
    </tr>
</tbody>
</table>
